name: STARSHIP (itch)
description:
How to play:

Click and drag to control the ship. Pickup stars to get points and improve your thrusters. Avoid bumping into things or you lose half your points and damage your thrusters. Try not to stress out about it too much though, just have fun!

This is an updated version of an old game of mine. The original game was made as part of a small university project in winter of 2015. This version is just the actual game component of that project with a bit of extra polish (better feedback, minor optimizations, etc).

Made with Processing.
